trans-unit.source: StorSimple hardware component replacement | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: StorSimple hardware component replacement | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes how to safely replace the PCMs, battery, controller modules, EBOD controllers, disk drives, and chassis of a StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to safely replace the PCMs, battery, controller modules, EBOD controllers, disk drives, and chassis of a StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: The hardware component replacement tutorials describe the hardware components of your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device and the steps necessary to remove and replace them.
trans-unit.target: The hardware component replacement tutorials describe the hardware components of your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device and the steps necessary to remove and replace them.

trans-unit.source: This article describes the safety icons, provides pointers to the detailed tutorials, and lists the components that are replaceable.
trans-unit.target: This article describes the safety icons, provides pointers to the detailed tutorials, and lists the components that are replaceable.

trans-unit.source: Before attempting to remove or replace any StorSimple component, make sure that you review the <linkText>safety icon conventions</linkText><title></title> and other <linkText>safety precautions</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Before attempting to remove or replace any StorSimple component, make sure that you review the <linkText>safety icon conventions</linkText><title></title> and other <linkText>safety precautions</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the safety icons used in these tutorials.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the safety icons used in these tutorials.

trans-unit.source: Pay close attention to these safety icons as you go through the steps to remove and replace device components.
trans-unit.target: Pay close attention to these safety icons as you go through the steps to remove and replace device components.

trans-unit.source: Indicates a hazardous situation that, if not avoided, will result in death or serious injury.
trans-unit.target: Indicates a hazardous situation that, if not avoided, will result in death or serious injury.

trans-unit.source: This signal word is limited to the most extreme situations.
trans-unit.target: This signal word is limited to the most extreme situations.

trans-unit.source: Indicates a hazardous situation that, if not avoided, could result in death or serious injury.
trans-unit.target: Indicates a hazardous situation that, if not avoided, could result in death or serious injury.

trans-unit.source: Indicates a hazardous situation that, if not avoided, could result in minor or moderate injury.
trans-unit.target: Indicates a hazardous situation that, if not avoided, could result in minor or moderate injury.

trans-unit.source: Indicates information considered important, but not hazard-related.
trans-unit.target: Indicates information considered important, but not hazard-related.

trans-unit.source: Do not access unless properly trained.
trans-unit.target: Do not access unless properly trained.

trans-unit.source: Familiarize yourself with the safety information about your device and safety icons used in this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Familiarize yourself with the safety information about your device and safety icons used in this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Go to <linkText>Safely install and operate your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title> for complete information.
trans-unit.target: Go to <linkText>Safely install and operate your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title> for complete information.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to review the <linkText>Safety precautions</linkText><title></title> before you handle your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Be sure to review the <linkText>Safety precautions</linkText><title></title> before you handle your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Before you attempt to replace a component, consider the following information.
trans-unit.target: Before you attempt to replace a component, consider the following information.

trans-unit.source: Ground yourself properly by using an electrostatic discharge or antistatic mat when handling modules and components of your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Ground yourself properly by using an electrostatic discharge or antistatic mat when handling modules and components of your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Use the supplied handles and guides while handling components that may have exposed circuitry.
trans-unit.target: Use the supplied handles and guides while handling components that may have exposed circuitry.

trans-unit.source: When you replace a module, NEVER leave an empty bay in the rear of the enclosure.
trans-unit.target: When you replace a module, NEVER leave an empty bay in the rear of the enclosure.

trans-unit.source: Obtain a replacement or blank module before removing the problem part.
trans-unit.target: Obtain a replacement or blank module before removing the problem part.

trans-unit.source: Your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device consists of several plug-in modules in the primary and/or EBOD enclosures.
trans-unit.target: Your Microsoft Azure StorSimple device consists of several plug-in modules in the primary and/or EBOD enclosures.

trans-unit.source: The 8100 has a single primary enclosure, whereas the 8600 is a dual enclosure device with a primary enclosure and an EBOD enclosure.
trans-unit.target: The 8100 has a single primary enclosure, whereas the 8600 is a dual enclosure device with a primary enclosure and an EBOD enclosure.

trans-unit.source: The main hardware components in your device are summarized in the following tables.
trans-unit.target: The main hardware components in your device are summarized in the following tables.

trans-unit.source: Click the link in the Replacement procedure column to go to the associated tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Click the link in the Replacement procedure column to go to the associated tutorial.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Replace the chassis on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Replace the chassis on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.target: <linkText>Replace a controller module on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Replace a Power and Cooling Module on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Replace a Power and Cooling Module on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Replace the backup battery module on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Replace the backup battery module on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Replace a disk drive on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Replace a disk drive on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Table 1 Hardware components in the primary enclosure
trans-unit.target: Table 1 Hardware components in the primary enclosure

trans-unit.source: The primary enclosure and the EBOD enclosure differ in their I/O modules.
trans-unit.target: The primary enclosure and the EBOD enclosure differ in their I/O modules.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the PCMs have different wattage.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, the PCMs have different wattage.

trans-unit.source: The PCMs in the primary enclosure are 764 W, whereas those in the EBOD enclosure are 580 W. The PCMs in the primary enclosure also contain a backup battery module.
trans-unit.target: The PCMs in the primary enclosure are 764 W, whereas those in the EBOD enclosure are 580 W. The PCMs in the primary enclosure also contain a backup battery module.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Replace the chassis on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Replace the chassis on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Replace an EBOD controller on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Replace an EBOD controller on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Replace a Power and Cooling Module on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Replace a Power and Cooling Module on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Replace a disk drive on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Replace a disk drive on your StorSimple device</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Table 2 Hardware components in the EBOD enclosure
trans-unit.target: Table 2 Hardware components in the EBOD enclosure

trans-unit.source: The plug-in modules on the device are highlighted in the following front and rear diagrams.
trans-unit.target: The plug-in modules on the device are highlighted in the following front and rear diagrams.

trans-unit.source: You can use these diagrams to determine the location of the various plug-in modules if a replacement is required.
trans-unit.target: You can use these diagrams to determine the location of the various plug-in modules if a replacement is required.

trans-unit.source: The front diagram shows the disk drives, and the rear diagrams of the EBOD enclosure and the primary enclosure show the plug-in modules.
trans-unit.target: The front diagram shows the disk drives, and the rear diagrams of the EBOD enclosure and the primary enclosure show the plug-in modules.

trans-unit.source: Both the primary enclosure and the EBOD enclosure have drive carrier modules.
trans-unit.target: Both the primary enclosure and the EBOD enclosure have drive carrier modules.

trans-unit.source: The chassis houses twelve 3.5" disk drives arranged in a 3 by 4 format.
trans-unit.target: The chassis houses twelve 3.5" disk drives arranged in a 3 by 4 format.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Backplane of device EBOD enclosure plug-in modules</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Backplane of device EBOD enclosure plug-in modules</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The following field replaceable units (FRUs) are available for your StorSimple device:
trans-unit.target: The following field replaceable units (FRUs) are available for your StorSimple device:

trans-unit.source: 764 W AC Power and Cooling Module
trans-unit.target: 764 W AC Power and Cooling Module

trans-unit.source: 580 W AC Power and Cooling Module
trans-unit.target: 580 W AC Power and Cooling Module

trans-unit.source: Hard disk drive with drive carrier module
trans-unit.target: Hard disk drive with drive carrier module

trans-unit.source: Please <linkText>contact Microsoft Support</linkText><title></title> to order any of these replacement units.
trans-unit.target: Please <linkText>contact Microsoft Support</linkText><title></title> to order any of these replacement units.

trans-unit.source: Review all <linkText>safety information</linkText><title></title> before you attempt to replace a StorSimple hardware component.
trans-unit.target: Review all <linkText>safety information</linkText><title></title> before you attempt to replace a StorSimple hardware component.
